name: PayOnDelivery
tag_list: social-markets, craigslist, oodle, classifieds, facebook, social-selling
overview:
PayOnDelivery is a revolutionary service that enables buyers to complete transactions online in social and free marketplaces with unknown sellers.

PayOnDelivery offers an easy to use integrated shipping and payment processing application that ensures buyers will not pay for an item until its delivered and sellers are guaranteed payment once the item is delivered.

Users can load items onto Payondelivery and share across Craigslist, Oodle, Facebook, Twitter or any other channel they can think of to make connections with buyers. With the PayOnDelivery logo, transactions are completed and closed quicker with buyer confidence in the legitimacy of the transaction. Location constraints of free marketplaces such as craigslist where Sellers have to meet with buyers to complete transactions are also removed.

The company is headquartered in Houston, TX.
